roleset.name: watch what you eat, (restricting one's) food intake, regulating or modifying eating behavior
roleset.note: DIET-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from diet.01-v)
DIET-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on WN eventive noun lexicon (4th sense). No VNcls. (from diet.01-n)

roles.note: If it starts to seem too much like it's referring to food itself, rather than the act of eating in a certain way, call it .YY. (from diet.01-n)

role.descr: distinguishing characteristic of the diet (ultimately indicates food consumed or avoided)

example.name: both args
example.text: Opinion On The Man Who-1 *T*-1 Dieted On McDonalds Food.
Both Drs. Meade and Grokest prescribed medications for him to take, and instructed him to watch his diet (to lower his cholesterol),

example.name: light verb, both args
example.text: So I'm prepping myself *pro* to do a green diet soon.

example.name: Light Verb
example.text: This is how-1 *PRO*-2 to do a diet that has minimal exercise *-1.
